abstract: Shares in the Italian luxury fashion house edged up slightly amid a blizzard of camera flashes and jostling journalists, bankers and company executives.
snippet: Shares in the Italian luxury fashion house edged up slightly amid a blizzard of camera flashes and jostling journalists, bankers and company executives.
lead_paragraph: Alex Hofford/European Pressphoto Agency Patrizio Bertelli, center, Prada’s chief executive, with a souvenir for Ronald Arculli, chairman of the Hong Kong Exchange, and Teresa Ko, chairwoman of the Hong Kong Exchange Listing Committee.

headline.main: Prada’s I.P.O. Debuts in Hong Kong Amid Investor Jitters
